payload.content: A new architecture for agents is emerging, transitioning from stateless tools to machines that learn and improve.

name: A new architecture for agents is emerging, transitioning from stateless tools to
content: A new architecture for agents is emerging, transitioning from stateless tools to machines that learn and improve.

payload.content: Every Agent 1.0 will evolve into a pattern that enables learning and improvement.

name: Every Agent 1.0 will evolve into a pattern that enables learning and improvement
content: Every Agent 1.0 will evolve into a pattern that enables learning and improvement.

payload.content: Dash's architecture enables an agent to learn from mistakes, layer in context as needed, and improve with use.

name: Dash's architecture enables an agent to learn from mistakes, layer in context as
content: Dash's architecture enables an agent to learn from mistakes, layer in context as needed, and improve with use.

payload.content: OpenAI's internal data agent uses 6 layers of context, a self-learning memory system, and has been validated in production.

name: OpenAI's internal data agent uses 6 layers of context, a self-learning memory sy
content: OpenAI's internal data agent uses 6 layers of context, a self-learning memory system, and has been validated in production.

payload.content: The architecture of OpenAI's data agent validates a 'gpu-poor continuous learning approach'.

name: The architecture of OpenAI's data agent validates a 'gpu-poor continuous learnin
content: The architecture of OpenAI's data agent validates a 'gpu-poor continuous learning approach'.

payload.content: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of context: Table Usage (schema, columns, relationships), Human Annotations (metrics, definitions, gotchas), Query Patterns (known working SQL), Institutional Knowledge (external docs, research), Memory (error patterns, discovered fixes), and Runtime Context (live schema changes).

name: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of conte
content: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of context: Table Usage (schema, columns, relationships), Human Annotations (metrics, definitions, gotchas), Query Patterns (known working SQL), Institutional Knowledge (external docs, research), Memory (error patterns, discovered fixes), and Runtime Context (live schema changes).

payload.content: Dash incorporates a self-learning component that runs in parallel to the core agent loop.

name: Dash incorporates a self-learning component that runs in parallel to the core ag
content: Dash incorporates a self-learning component that runs in parallel to the core agent loop.

payload.content: When an agent makes a mistake, it should capture the fix and store it in a searchable learning store; when something works, it should identify the pattern and add it to its knowledge base.

name: When an agent makes a mistake, it should capture the fix and store it in a searc
content: When an agent makes a mistake, it should capture the fix and store it in a searchable learning store; when something works, it should identify the pattern and add it to its knowledge base.

payload.content: Agents with a dedicated learning component that travels with them, providing an extra layer of context via In-Context Learning (ICL), will improve with use.

name: Agents with a dedicated learning component that travels with them, providing an
content: Agents with a dedicated learning component that travels with them, providing an extra layer of context via In-Context Learning (ICL), will improve with use.
